text: Hi folks, does anyone know how to get the HubSpot CLI to run `fetch` faster? It seems like it fetches everything even the files that have not changed.
In the past I think the answer is ‘no’ but I wasn’t sure if HubSpot has done any work to speed up their tool in recent times.

I recommend to fetch the folder instead of full root.

If you haven't seen the changes use

hs fetch 'myfolder' 'myfolder/src' --overwrite

change the src and destination accordingly
